name: Portal Twister
description:
Portal Twister Gamy's Adventure

A web based game about Gamy, who likes to dance with Wormy, until a swarm of bugs kidnap Gamy.

And so, Gamy's adventure begins.

Controls:
A - Move to left
D - Move to right
Spacebar - Jump
T - Reset level

My twitter: https://twitter.com/Javisin_er

Assets used:
https://www.kenney.nl/assets/simplified-platformer-pack
https://www.kenney.nl/assets/platformer-art-extended-enemies
